006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.binding.metaschema;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.PositiveIntegerAdapter;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.StringAdapter;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.TokenAdapter;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupLine;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupLineAdapter;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IBoundObject;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IMetaschemaData;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.JsonGroupAsBehavior;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraint;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.AllowedValue;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.AllowedValues;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundAssembly;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundField;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundFlag;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.GroupAs;
024import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.MetaschemaAssembly;
025import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.ValueConstraints;
026
027import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ReflectionToStringBuilder;
028import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ToStringStyle;
029
030import java.math.BigInteger;
031import java.util.LinkedList;
032import java.util.List;
033
034@SuppressWarnings({
035    "PMD.DataClass",
036    "PMD.FieldNamingConventions"
037})
038@MetaschemaAssembly(
039    formalName = "Inline Flag Definition",
040    name = "inline-define-flag",
041    moduleClass = MetaschemaModelModule.class)
042public class InlineDefineFlag implements IBoundObject {
043  private final IMetaschemaData __metaschemaData;
044
045  @BoundFlag(
046      formalName = "Inline Flag Name",
047      name = "name",
048      required = true,
049      typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class)
050  private String _name;
051
052  @BoundFlag(
053      formalName = "Inline Flag Binary Name",
054      name = "index",
055      typeAdapter = PositiveIntegerAdapter.class)
056  private BigInteger _index;
057
058  @BoundFlag(
059      formalName = "Deprecated Version",
060      name = "deprecated",
061      typeAdapter = StringAdapter.class)
062  private String _deprecated;
063
064  @BoundFlag(
065      formalName = "Flag Value Data Type",
066      name = "as-type",
067      defaultValue = "string",
068      typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class,
069      valueConstraints = @ValueConstraints(allowedValues = @AllowedValues(level = IConstraint.Level.ERROR,
070          allowOthers = true,
071          values = { @AllowedValue(value = "base64", description = ""),
072              @AllowedValue(value = "boolean", description = ""), @AllowedValue(value = "date", description = ""),
073              @AllowedValue(value = "date-time", description = ""),
074              @AllowedValue(value = "date-time-with-timezone", description = ""),
075              @AllowedValue(value = "date-with-timezone", description = ""),
076              @AllowedValue(value = "day-time-duration", description = ""),
077              @AllowedValue(value = "decimal", description = ""),
078              @AllowedValue(value = "email-address", description = ""),
079              @AllowedValue(value = "hostname", description = ""), @AllowedValue(value = "integer", description = ""),
080              @AllowedValue(value = "ip-v4-address", description = ""),
081              @AllowedValue(value = "ip-v6-address", description = ""),
082              @AllowedValue(value = "non-negative-integer", description = ""),
083              @AllowedValue(value = "positive-integer", description = ""),
084              @AllowedValue(value = "string", description = ""), @AllowedValue(value = "token", description = ""),
085              @AllowedValue(value = "uri", description = ""), @AllowedValue(value = "uri-reference", description = ""),
086              @AllowedValue(value = "uuid", description = ""), @AllowedValue(value = "base64Binary", description = ""),
087              @AllowedValue(value = "dateTime", description = ""),
088              @AllowedValue(value = "dateTime-with-timezone", description = ""),
089              @AllowedValue(value = "email", description = ""),
090              @AllowedValue(value = "nonNegativeInteger", description = ""),
091              @AllowedValue(value = "positiveInteger", description = "") })))
092  private String _asType;
093
094  @BoundFlag(
095      formalName = "Default Flag Value",
096      name = "default",
097      typeAdapter = StringAdapter.class)
098  private String _default;
099
100  @BoundFlag(
101      formalName = "Is Flag Required?",
102      name = "required",
103      defaultValue = "no",
104      typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class,
105      valueConstraints = @ValueConstraints(allowedValues = @AllowedValues(level = IConstraint.Level.ERROR,
106          values = { @AllowedValue(value = "yes", description = ""), @AllowedValue(value = "no", description = "") })))
107  private String _required;
108
109  @BoundField(
110      formalName = "Formal Name",
111      description = "A formal name for the data construct, to be presented in documentation.",
112      useName = "formal-name")
113  private String _formalName;
114
115  @BoundField(
116      formalName = "Description",
117      description = "A short description of the data construct's purpose, describing the constructs semantics.",
118      useName = "description",
119      typeAdapter = MarkupLineAdapter.class)
120  private MarkupLine _description;
121
122  @BoundAssembly(
123      formalName = "Property",
124      useName = "prop",
125      maxOccurs = -1,
126      groupAs = @GroupAs(name = "props", inJson = JsonGroupAsBehavior.LIST))
127  private List<Property> _props;
128
129  @BoundAssembly(
130      useName = "constraint")
131  private FlagConstraints _constraint;
132
133  @BoundField(
134      formalName = "Remarks",
135      description = "Any explanatory or helpful information to be provided about the remarks parent.",
136      useName = "remarks")
137  private Remarks _remarks;
138
139  @BoundAssembly(
140      formalName = "Example",
141      useName = "example",
142      maxOccurs = -1,
143      groupAs = @GroupAs(name = "examples", inJson = JsonGroupAsBehavior.LIST))
144  private List<Example> _examples;
145
146  public InlineDefineFlag() {
147    this(null);
148  }
149
150  public InlineDefineFlag(IMetaschemaData data) {
151    this.__metaschemaData = data;
152  }
153
154  @Override
155  public IMetaschemaData getMetaschemaData() {
156    return __metaschemaData;
157  }
158
159  public String getName() {
160    return _name;
161  }
162
163  public void setName(String value) {
164    _name = value;
165  }
166
167  public BigInteger getIndex() {
168    return _index;
169  }
170
171  public void setIndex(BigInteger value) {
172    _index = value;
173  }
174
175  public String getDeprecated() {
176    return _deprecated;
177  }
178
179  public void setDeprecated(String value) {
180    _deprecated = value;
181  }
182
183  public String getAsType() {
184    return _asType;
185  }
186
187  public void setAsType(String value) {
188    _asType = value;
189  }
190
191  public String getDefault() {
192    return _default;
193  }
194
195  public void setDefault(String value) {
196    _default = value;
197  }
198
199  public String getRequired() {
200    return _required;
201  }
202
203  public void setRequired(String value) {
204    _required = value;
205  }
206
207  public String getFormalName() {
208    return _formalName;
209  }
210
211  public void setFormalName(String value) {
212    _formalName = value;
213  }
214
215  public MarkupLine getDescription() {
216    return _description;
217  }
218
219  public void setDescription(MarkupLine value) {
220    _description = value;
221  }
222
223  public List<Property> getProps() {
224    return _props;
225  }
226
227  public void setProps(List<Property> value) {
228    _props = value;
229  }
230
231  /**
232   * Add a new {@link Property} item to the underlying collection.
233   *
234   * @param item
235   *          the item to add
236   * @return {@code true}
237   */
238  public boolean addProp(Property item) {
239    Property value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
240    if (_props == null) {
241      _props = new LinkedList<>();
242    }
243    return _props.add(value);
244  }
245
246  /**
247   * Remove the first matching {@link Property} item from the underlying
248   * collection.
249   *
250   * @param item
251   *          the item to remove
252   * @return {@code true} if the item was removed or {@code false} otherwise
253   */
254  public boolean removeProp(Property item) {
255    Property value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
256    return _props != null && _props.remove(value);
257  }
258
259  public FlagConstraints getConstraint() {
260    return _constraint;
261  }
262
263  public void setConstraint(FlagConstraints value) {
264    _constraint = value;
265  }
266
267  public Remarks getRemarks() {
268    return _remarks;
269  }
270
271  public void setRemarks(Remarks value) {
272    _remarks = value;
273  }
274
275  public List<Example> getExamples() {
276    return _examples;
277  }
278
279  public void setExamples(List<Example> value) {
280    _examples = value;
281  }
282
283  /**
284   * Add a new {@link Example} item to the underlying collection.
285   *
286   * @param item
287   *          the item to add
288   * @return {@code true}
289   */
290  public boolean addExample(Example item) {
291    Example value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
292    if (_examples == null) {
293      _examples = new LinkedList<>();
294    }
295    return _examples.add(value);
296  }
297
298  /**
299   * Remove the first matching {@link Example} item from the underlying
300   * collection.
301   *
302   * @param item
303   *          the item to remove
304   * @return {@code true} if the item was removed or {@code false} otherwise
305   */
306  public boolean removeExample(Example item) {
307    Example value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
308    return _examples != null && _examples.remove(value);
309  }
310
311  @Override
312  public String toString() {
313    return new ReflectionToStringBuilder(this, ToStringStyle.MULTI_LINE_STYLE).toString();
314  }
315}
